text.section: There is an AIDS Prevention Sterile Needle and Syringe Exchange Pilot Program in the Baltimore City Health Department.

The Program shall:
Provide for the one-for-one exchange by participants of used hypodermic needles and syringes for sterile hypodermic needles and syringes; and
Operate in accordance with the procedures approved, with the advice and approval of the oversight committee, by the Commissioner of Health.
